Reviews.Title: “Listen to the reviews... Stay Away!”
Reviews.Author: NYCnative76
Reviews.Content: spent night rome sister town staying hotel inexpensive id leaving 300 am day flight staying booked night awful worth 40 euros coughed bed 20 springs popping sleep uncomfortable linens threadbare holes fitted sheet blanket looked hadnt washed 1980 bathroom smelled sewage worst bed bug bites day thanks god didnt home seriously unhygienic breakfast sister stayed 3 nights served heard write home wasnt awful theres hotel called crosti stayed rest time rome cost 63 euros night booked hotelscom afford pay extra 23 euros

Reviews.Title: “Great location, very poor rooms”

Reviews.Content: stayed bed hotel 2 hotel location close termini station unfortunately shown site pictures bathroom dirty especially shower blankets dirty looked army discovered kitchen found inside closet frustrating friends bitten bed bugs pitty paid 15 euro personper night expected clean breakfast included croissant glass red juice cup coffee opinion hotel option people sleep believe hotels rome
